Extensions.File:
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
; Block Bing Extension [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Common\OfficeUpdate] "PreventBingInstall"=dword:00000001
; Disable Edge desktop shortcut [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\EdgeUpdate] "CreateDesktopShortcutDefault"=dword:00000000 "RemoveDesktopShortcutDefault"=dword:00000001
[-HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\MyComputer\NameSpace\{F0D63F85-37EC-4097-B30D-61B4A8917118}]
[-HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\MyComputer\NameSpace\{f86fa3ab-70d2-4fc7-9c99-fcbf05467f3a}]
[HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID\{018D5C66-4533-4307-9B53-224DE2ED1FE6}] "System.IsPinnedToNameSpaceTree"=dword:00000000
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Serialize] "StartupDelayInMSec"=dword:00000000
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Authentication\LogonUI\BootAnimation] "DisableStartupSound"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\EditionOverrides] "UserSetting_DisableStartupSound"=dword:00000001
;lower windows delays [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop] "AutoEndTasks"="1" "HungAppTimeout"="1000" "MenuShowDelay"="8" "WaitToKillAppTimeout"="2000" "LowLevelHooksTimeout"="1000"
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Mouse] "MouseHoverTime"="8"
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\Explorer] "NoLowDiskSpaceChecks"=dword:00000001 "LinkResolveIgnoreLinkInfo"=dword:00000001 "NoResolveSearch"=dword:00000001 "NoResolveTrack"=dword:00000001 "NoInternetOpenWith"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control] "WaitToKillServiceTimeout"="2000"
;Dont_show_tabs_from_apps_when_snapping_or_Alt+Tab [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "MultiTaskingAltTabFilter"=dword:00000003
;disable edge startup boost [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge] "StartupBoostEnabled"=dword:00000000
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Keyboard] "PrintScreenKeyForSnippingEnabled"=dword:00000001
; left taskbar alignment [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "TaskbarAl"=dword:00000000
; set date and time VN [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International] "Locale"="00000C00" "LocaleName"="en-001" "s1159"="AM" "s2359"="PM" "sCurrency"="XDR" "sDate"="/" "sDecimal"="." "sGrouping"="3;0" "sLanguage"="ZZZ" "sList"="," "sLongDate"="dddd, d MMMM yyyy" "sMonDecimalSep"="." "sMonGrouping"="3;0" "sMonThousandSep"="," "sNativeDigits"="0123456789" "sNegativeSign"="-" "sPositiveSign"="" "sShortDate"="dd/MM/yy" "sThousand"="," "sTime"=":" "sTimeFormat"="h:mm:ss tt" "sShortTime"="h:mm tt" "sYearMonth"="MMMM yyyy" "iCalendarType"="1" "iCountry"="388" "iCurrDigits"="2" "iCurrency"="0" "iDate"="1" "iDigits"="2" "NumShape"="1" "iFirstDayOfWeek"="0" "iFirstWeekOfYear"="0" "iLZero"="1" "iMeasure"="0" "iNegCurr"="1" "iNegNumber"="1" "iPaperSize"="9" "iTime"="0" "iTimePrefix"="0" "iTLZero"="0"
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\Geo] "Nation"="251" "Name"="VN"
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\üåéüåèüåç] "Calendar"="Gregorian"
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\TimeZoneInformation‚Äã] "TimeZoneKeyName"="SE Asia Standard Time"
; hide search button on taskbar [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Windows Search] "SearchOnTaskbarMode"=dword:00000000
; Disable Task View button [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer] "HideTaskViewButton"=dword:00000001
; hide widget button [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "TaskbarDa"=dword:00000000
; Disable multitasking Edge tabs [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "MultiTaskingAltTabFilter"=dword:00000003
; Disable Windows Copilot [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsCopilot] "TurnOffWindowsCopilot"=dword:00000001
; restart apps when sign-in [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon] "RestartApps"=dword:00000001
; Restore previous folders at logon [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "PersistBrowsers"=dword:00000001
; Disable start menu web search (disabling file explorer search history too) ;[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer] ;"DisableSearchBoxSuggestions"=dword:00000001 ; win11 use this instead: [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Search] "BingSearchEnabled"=dword:00000000
; remove video folder from this PC [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\NonEnum] "{A0953C92-50DC-43bf-BE83-3742FED03C9C}"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Desktop\NameSpace\{A0953C92-50DC-43bf-BE83-3742FED03C9C}] "HiddenByDefault"=dword:00000001
;remove music folder from this PC [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\NonEnum] "{1CF1260C-4DD0-4ebb-811F-33C572699FDE}"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Desktop\NameSpace\{1CF1260C-4DD0-4ebb-811F-33C572699FDE}] "HiddenByDefault"=dword:00000001
;remove home and gallery from navigation bar in Explorer [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Desktop\NameSpace\{e88865ea-0e1c-4e20-9aa6-edcd0212c87c}] @="Gallery" "HiddenByDefault"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\NonEnum] "{e88865ea-0e1c-4e20-9aa6-edcd0212c87c}"=dword:00000001
[-HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Desktop\NameSpace\{f874310e-b6b7-47dc-bc84-b9e6b38f5903}]
; disable transparency effects [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Themes\Personalize] "EnableTransparency"=dword:00000000
; hide language bar [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\CTF\LangBar] "ShowStatus"=dword:00000003
; disable language hot keys [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Keyboard Layout\Toggle] "Language Hotkey"="3" "Hotkey"="3" "Layout Hotkey"="3"
; touchpad settings [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\PrecisionTouchPad] "LeaveOnWithMouse"=dword:00000001 "ThreeFingerTapEnabled"=dword:00000004 "FourFingerTapEnabled"=dword:00000004
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\PrecisionTouchPad\Status] "Enabled"=dword:00000001
; hide task view button [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer] "HideTaskViewButton"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer] "HideTaskViewButton"=dword:00000001
